attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the number of pedestrians and drivers seriously injured by police vehicles in persuit and with alarmingly few prosecutions which have found guilty party after causing death or serious injury to a member of the public..It is time to suspend or ban police car pursuits until such time as either reliable recorders "Black Boxs" are fitted in all patrol cars or alternative electronic equipment is fitted to accurately and honestly determine the circumstances before and after such incident
